#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,tc=1;
	cin>>t;
	string arr[]={"C","C#","D","D#","E","F","F#","G","G#","A","A#","B"};
	while(t--){
		int f,s,ans=0;
		cin>>f>>s;
		cout<<"Case "<<tc<<": ";
		tc++;
		if(s==1)
			ans=4;
		else if(s==2)
			ans=11;
		else if(s==3)
			ans=7;
		else if(s==4)
			ans=2;
		else if(s==5)
			ans=9;
		else
			ans=4;
		ans=(ans+f)%12;
		cout<<arr[ans]<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
